definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Zadeh was the first who developed his Fuzzy-set Theory.
sentences.chinese: 札德是提出模糊集合论的第一人。

sentences.english: There are contradictions in current theories of real number and ZFC.
sentences.chinese: 现行实数理论与ZFC公理集合论中都有矛盾。

sentences.english: Non-well-founded set theory is to study circular or hyper sets.
sentences.chinese: 非良基集合论是研究循环的或超常集合的理论。

sentences.english: Methods Using method of the theory of set and general topology.
sentences.chinese: 方法集合论与点集拓扑学中的方法。

sentences.english: After the theory of knowledge set is put forward, it cause certain dispute in the educational circles of the library.
sentences.chinese: 知识集合论提出后，在图书馆学界引起了一定的争议。

sentences.english: The problem is akin to what happened in early set theory.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题类似早期集合论发生的情况。

definition: Cantor (name)/Georg Cantor (1845-1918), German mathematician, founder of set theory 集合論|集合论[ji2 he2 lun4]
